Reviews.Title: Love this - but only with plenty of lighting
Reviews.Author: S. Haynes
Reviews.Content: Love the saturated, vivid colors this camera produces, as well as the vignetting in the pictures. Unfortunately this camera requires plenty of natural lighting, or you'll waste a shot if you use it even in the shade. Fun to use, ultra compact, great to give as a gift! Also, it's a little difficult to open it up to change out the film...

Reviews.Title: Very wide angle.
Reviews.Author: James F. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Very, very basic film camera. Gets nice colors and has a super wide angle.  Good if you're in a tight spot where you can't get too far from the subject.

Reviews.Title: cute
Reviews.Author: Jihyun Ro
Reviews.Content: cute design, light weight, easy controlA B C D E F G H  I J K L M N

ProductInfo.Features:
Utilizes easy to find, standard 35mm film
Shoot dynamic, wide pictures with 22m wide angle lens
Surprisingly vivid colors make your pictures bright and crisp
Incredible vignetting effect gives you the Lomo, Holga feel
